form.label: ULS Exceptions
form.searchTemplate: eventtype=mssharepoint-uls Exception | eval ExceptionMessage=replace(Message,"[:\.].*","") | stats count by Area,Category,Level,Process_Name,host,ExceptionMessage

table.title: Exceptions by Area
table.searchPostProcess: stats sum(count) as count by Area | sort - count

table.title: Exceptions by Category
table.searchPostProcess: stats sum(count) as count by Category | sort - count

table.title: Exceptions by Level
table.searchPostProcess: stats sum(count) by Level | sort - count

table.title: Exceptions by Process
table.searchPostProcess: stats sum(count) as count by Process | sort - count

table.title: Exceptions by Host
table.searchPostProcess: stats sum(count) by host | sort - count

table.title: Exceptions by Message
table.searchPostProcess: stats sum(count) by ExceptionMessage | sort - count
